column3: ANT-MAN Translation. Review by Angel.
Stark!
He does not seem happy.
Hello, Hank!
You are supposed to be in Moscow.
I took a detour.
Through your defense lab.
Tell me that is not what I think it is.
That depends if you think it is a poor attempt to replicate my work.
Even for this group, that takes nerve.
You were instructed to go to Russia.
May I remind you, Dr. Pym? That you are a soldier.
I am a scientist.
Then act like one.
The Pym Particle is the most revolutionary science ever developed.
Help us put it to good use.
I let you turn me into your errand boy,
and now do you try to steal my research?
If only you would protected Janet with such ferocity, Dr. Pym.
Easy, Hank!
You mention my wife again,
and I will show you ferocity.
You do not look at me. You said it.
I formally tender my resignation.
We do not accept it. Formally.
Hank,
we need you.
The Pym Particle is a miracle. Please.
You do not let your past determine the future.
As long as I am alive,
nobody will ever get that formula.
We should not let him leave the building.
You have already lied to him. Now do you want to go to war with him?
Yes.
Our scientists have not come close to replicating his work.
He just kicked your ass, full-size.
You really want to find out what it is like when you cannot see him coming?
I have known Hank Pym for a long time.
He is not security risk.
Unless we make him one.
Do you like that?
Do you like that?
You come get some now.
You did not even move.
No.
What if do I come in on the left side? Right! Just down here.
Do you see this right here?
I am going to miss you, Scott.
I am going to miss you, too, Peachy.
Man, you people got the weirdest goodbye rituals.
All right, break it up.
Break it up! Break it up!
SAN QUENTIN - PENITENTIARY
Scott!
What is up, man!
Damn! Hey.
Hey, man!
Hey, what is up with your eye?
Well! What do you think? Peachy. It is a going-away present.
Yeah. I still got my scar from a year ago.
#NAME?
Do you know what? I am still the only one who knocked him out.
Well! I definitely did not.
Thanks for picking me up, brother.
Bro, do you think I am going to miss my cell getting out?
Hey! How is your girl, man?
She left me.
Yeah! My Mommy died, too.
And, my Daddy get deported.
However, I get the van!
#NAME?
Thanks for the hook-up, too. I needed a place to stay.
You wait until you see this couch. You are going to be happy.
You are going to be on your feet in no time. Watch!
#NAME?
And I got to introduce you to some people. Some skilled people.
#NAME?
No, I am serious, man. I am not going back.
I got a daughter to take care of.
You know that jobs do not come easy for ex-cons, right.
Look! Man, I got a master's in electrical engineering, all right?
I am going to be fine.
Welcome to Baskin-Robbins.
Would you like to try our Mango Fruit Blast?
No, thanks.
I will have... I will have a burger, please.
We do not... We do not make that.
Pretzel. Hot pretzel. Like mustard. Do you have mustard dip?
It is ice cream. Baskin-Robbins.
I will just do, like, whatever is hot and fresh?
Dude!
Can I see you in the back, chief? Quickly.
Sure, Dale.
Darby, could you just take care of this idiot? Thanks.
- Hey, Dale! - Come on in.
Pull up some chair.
Three years at San Quentin.
You found out.
Baskin-Robbins always finds out.
Look! I am sorry, all right. However, I...
No one would hire me.
Breaking and entering. Grand larceny.
Look! I am sorry.
I do not do it anymore. I just...
Respect.
I could not be happier about it.
#NAME?
Thank you. Thank you.
You really stuck it to those billionaire Sobs.
The more I read about what you made and stuff.
I am like, wow! I know this person.
I am in charge of this person.
Well! I am very happy in this job.
And I really just appreciate the opportunity to...
Well! You are fired, of course!
I cannot really keep you on.
Wait! What? Fired?
Yeah.
Dale, look, it was not a violent crime. I mean, I am a good worker.
No, it was not a violent crime. It was a cool crime.
I will tell you what, though.
This will be totally off the books, off the records,
but if you want to grab one of those Mango Fruit Blasts,
on your way out the door,
I will just pretend I did not see it.
Hey, Scott! What is up?
I thought you were supposed to be at work.
I was. I was fired.
Damn. Did they find out who you are?
Yeah.
Baskin-Robbins always finds out, bro.
Baskin-Robbins does not play.
#NAME?
That is Kurt.
He was Folsom for five years. He is a wizard on that laptop.
#NAME?
Who are you?
Dave.
Nice work on the vista job.
Vista job, yes.
No, no. I have heard of this Vista robbery.
Well! Technically, I did not rob them. Robbery involves threat.
I hate violence. I burgled them. I am a cat burglar.
You mean... You are a pussy.
Yeah.
They were overcharging the customers, right.
And it added up to millions.
He blows the whistle and he is fired.
And what does he do?
He hacks into the security system,
and transfers millions back to the people that they stole it from.
Posts all the bank records online.
And he drove the dude's Bentley into his swimming pool.
What are you doing?
Why are you telling my life story to these people?
What do you want?
Okay.
My cousin talked to this person two weeks ago.
- About this little perfect job. - No way!
No, no, no. Wait! This person... This person fits your MO.
No!
I am finished, man. I am not going back to jail.
It is some retired millionaire living off his severance agreement.
It is a perfect Scott Lang mark!
I do not care. I am out.
Dr. Pym?
Yes. I am still alive.
ID?
Perhaps that will suffice.
Very sorry, sir! Please come in.
Is that Hank Pym?
Good morning, Hank!
Hope.
Would it kill you to call me Daddy?
Dr. Cross will be so pleased that you could find the time to join us today.
More like thrilled.
I was surprised to receive any kind of invitation from you, Darren.
What is the occasion?
You will see. Will not he, Hope?
We are ready for you inside.
Ouch!
I guess some old wounds never heal.
You do not worry. She is safe.
You are in for a treat.
Long time no see you, Dr. Pym. How is retirement?
How is your face?
After you.
Now, before we start, I would like to introduce a very special guest.
This company's founder and my mentor,
Dr. Hank Pym.
When I took over this company for Dr. Pym,
I immediately started researching a particle
that could change the distance between atoms,
while increasing density and strength.
Why this revolutionary idea remained buried
beneath the dust and cobwebs of Hank's research, I could not tell you.
However, just imagine,
a soldier the size of an insect.
The ultimate secret weapon.
An Ant-Man.
That is what they called you. Right, Hank?
Silly, I know.
Propaganda.
Tales to astonish!
Trumped-up BS to scare the USSR.
Hank, will you tell our guests? What you told me...
every single time I asked you,
Was the Ant-Man real?
Just a tall tale.
Right.
Because how could anything so miraculous possibly be real?
Well! I was inspired by the legend of the Ant-Man.
And with my breakthrough shrinking inorganic material,
I thought. Could it be possible to shrink a person?
Could that be done?
Well! It is not a legend anymore.
Distinguished guests,
I am proud to present the end of warfare as we know it.
The Yellow jacket!
No.
The Yellow jacket is an all-purpose weapon of war...
capable of altering the size of the wearer...
for the ultimate combat advantage.
We live in an era.
In which the weapons we use to protect ourselves.
Are undermined by constant surveillance.
It is time to return to a simpler age.
One where the powers of freedom can once again operate openly,
to protect their interests.
An all-purpose peace-keeping vessel.
The Yellow jacket can manage any conflict.
On the geopolitical landscape.
column4: Distinguished guests, I am proud to present the end of warfare as we know it

column3: Completely unseen.
column4: Distinguished guests, I am proud to present the end of warfare as we know it

column3: Efficient in both preventatives measures and tactical assault.
column4: Distinguished guests, I am proud to present the end of warfare as we know it

column3: Practical applications include surveillance.
Industrial sabotage.
And the elimination of obstructions on the road to peace.
A single Yellow jacket.
Offers the user unlimited influence to carry out protective actions.
And, one day soon, an army of Yellow jackets.
It will create a sustainable environment of well-being around the world.
The Yellow jacket.
So, is it a suit?
You do not be crude, Frank.
It is not a suit. It is a vessel.
What is the matter? Are not you impressed?
No, I am impressed. I am also concerned.
Imagine what our enemies could do with this tech.
We should have a longer conversation about that, Frank.
I really value your opinion.
Thank you for coming. Hope?
Thank you very much, everybody. I will escort you out now.
Thank you.
You seem a bit shocked.
Darren, there is a reason that I buried these secrets.
Therefore, you finally admit it!
We could have done this together, Hank. However, you ruined that.
That is why you are the past and I am the future.
You do not do this.
Dr. Cross?
You sell to me first, 20% over your asking price.
I can have the cash here in two weeks.
Deal.
We have to make our move, Hank.
How close is he?
He still cannot shrink a live subject.
Just give me the suit and let me finish this for the last time.
No.
I have Cross complete trust.
#NAME?
Well! That is not entirely true.
I think I found a person.
Who?
Daddy!
Peanut!
Happy birthday!
I am so sorry I am late.
I did not know what time your party started.
It was on the invitation.
He did not get an invitation.
However, he came anyway!
Well! I am not going to miss my little girl's birthday party.
I am going to go tell Mommy you are here.
You do not...
What are you doing here, Lang?
You have not paid a dime of child support.
You know, right now, if I wanted to, I could arrest you.
It is good to see you too, Paxton.
Mommy is so happy you are here, she choked on her drink.
Hey, look what I have for you.
Can I open it now?
Of course, sweetheart! It is your birthday.
You are my best friend.
What is that thing?
He is so ugly!
I love him!
Can I go show my friends?
Of course, sweetheart! Go ahead.
You are my best friend.
Look, the child support is coming, all right?
It is just hard finding a job when you have a record.
I am sure you will figure it out. However, for now, I want you out of my house.
- No way! It is my daughter's birthday. - It is my house!
- So what? She is my kid! - Scott!
You cannot just show up here. You know that. Come on.
It is a birthday party.
Yeah, I know, but you cannot just show up.
She is my daughter.
You do not know the first thing about being a father.
Maggie, I tell you this as a friend, and as the first love of my life.
Your fianc� is an ass hat.
He is not an ass hat.
- Hey! You watch your language. Okay! - What language? I said hat.
Stop it.
Really, Maggie? That person?
Come on! You could marry anyone you want.
And you have to get engaged to a cop.
At least he is not a crook.
I am trying, okay. I have changed. I am straight.
I had a job and...
I want to provide.
I had a lot of time to think about it and I love her.
So much.
I have missed so much time, and I want to be a part of her life.
What do I do?
Get an apartment,
get a job, pay child support.
Then we will talk about visitation, I promise.
You are her hero, Scott.
Just be the person that she already thinks you are.
I am sorry you have such deep concerns about the Yellow jacket, Frank.
Yeah. Well...
Unfortunately, we cannot just do whatever we want.
It would be nice though, right?
However, there are laws.
What laws? Of man?
The laws of nature transcend the laws of man.
And I have transcended the laws of nature.
Darren, I do not think you understand...
We still have not worked out all the bugs.
Goodbye, Frank!
Thank you.
You know, I have been thinking a lot about gratitude lately.
And today, during my morning meditation,
an interesting thought occurred to me, I think it might apply to you, too.
How is that?
Gratitude can be forgiveness.
I have spent years carrying around my anger for Hank Pym.
I devoted my genius to him.
I could have worked anywhere.
I chose my mentor poorly.
You did not even have a choice.
He never believed in you.
It is a shame what we had to do, however, he forced us to do it, did not he?
We should not be angry, we should be grateful.
Because his failures as a mentor,
as a father,
forced us to spread our wings.
You are a success, Darren.
You deserve everything coming your way.
Stop cheating.
Hey! What is up, hotshot?
Maybe he did not hear you.
How was the party?
#NAME?
I want to know about that tip.
Baby, it is! It is so on, right now.
Calm down! All right! I just need to know where it came from.
It has to be airtight.
Okay.
I was at a wine tasting with my cousin Ernesto.
Which was a mainly red? And you know I do not like reds, man.
However there was ros� that saved the day. It was delightful.
And then he tells me about this girl, Emily, that we used to kick it with.
It was actually the first pair of boobs I ever touched.
It is the wrong details.
It has nothing to do with the story.
Go.
So, he tells me that she is working as a housekeeper now, right?
And she is dating this dude, Carlos, who is a shot caller from across the bay.
And she tells him about the dude that she is cleaning.
Right. That he is like this big-shot CEO.
That is all retired now, but he is loaded.
So, Carlos and Ernesto are on the same softball team.
They get to talking, right?
And here comes the good part. Carlos says, you, man.
This person have got a big-ass safe just sitting in the basement, just chilling.
Of course! Ernesto comes to me because he knows I got mad thieving skills.
Of course! I ask him.
Did Emily tell Carlos to tell you to get me what kind of safe it was?
And he says, no dawg.
All she said is that it is super-legit.
Whatever is in it. It is got to be good.
What?
Old man has a safe.
And he has gone for a week.
All right! There is an old man he has a safe.
He has gone for a week.
Let us just work with that.
Do you know what I am saying?
Landline cut, cell signals jammed.
No one will be making for distress call tonight.
Come on check.
#NAME?
Hey, if the job goes bad, you know I got your back, right?
You do not worry.
column4: and they get to talking, right? And here comes the good part. Carlos says

column3: It is not going to happen.
I love it when he gets cocky.
Damn!
Alarm is dead.
Nice.
column4: Emily tell Carlos to tell you to get to me what kind of safe it was? And he says

column3: All right! I am moving through the house.
There is a fingerprint lock on the door.
Does it have what? Ernesto did not tell me anything about that.
Man, are we screwed?
Not necessarily.
I am in.
No alarms have been triggered. He is in like the Flynn.
column4: Emily tell Carlos to tell you to get to me what kind of safe it was? And he says

column3: Man.
What is it?
Well! They were not kidding. This safe is serious.
How serious are we talking, Scott?
It is a Carbondale.
It is from 1910.
Made from the same steel as the Titanic.
Wow!
Can you crack it?
Well! Here is the thing. It does not do so well in the cold.
Do you remember what that iceberg did?
Yeah, man. It killed DiCaprio.
Killed everybody.
It did not kill the Old woman.
She still throws the jewel into the oceans.
What are you doing?
I poured water in the locking mechanism and froze it with nitrogen.
Ice expands. Metal does not.
- What are you doing now? - Waiting.
Waiting.
Nice.
What is it? Cash? Jewels?
#NAME?
#NAME?
It is an old motorcycle suit.
There is no cash, no jewelry, nothing?
No.
It is a bust.
I am sorry, Scott.
I know you needed to score.
I thought we were using mice.
What is the difference?
Commence Experiment 34-C. Organic atomic reduction.
Darren, maybe we should think...
Shrinking organic tissue is the centerpiece of this technology?
I cannot go to the buyers with half a breakthrough.
Experiment 34-C results,
negative.
Sanitize the workstation. Bring in subject 35-C.
Why would you lock this up?
This is so weird.
Scott, what is up, man?
I wonder... What is this?
The world sure seem different from down here, does not it, Scott.
What? Who said that?
Luis, down here!
It is a trial by fire, Scott. Or, in this case,
water.
I guess you are tougher than you thought.
I do not want to see this!
Luis!
Son of a...
What the hell?
Not bad for a test drive.
Keep the suit. I will be in touch.
No! No! No, thank you!
Get down on the ground!
You are under arrest!
No, I did not steal anything! I was returning something I stole.
You do not move.
Do you know? You almost had us convinced...
that you were going to change your ways.
They were really rooting for you.
It is going to break their hearts.
#NAME?
Your lawyer.
My lawyer?
I told you I would be in touch, Scott.
I am starting to think that you prefer the inside of a jail cell.
Man!
Sit down.
Sir, I am sorry I stole the suit.
I do not even want to know why you have it.
Maggie was right about you.
How do you know about...?
No wonder she is trying to keep you away from Cassie.
The moment things get hard,
you turn right back to crime.
The way I see it, you have a choice.
You can either spend the rest of your life in prison,
or go back to your cell.
And await further instructions.
I do not understand.
No, I do not expect you to...
You do not have many options right now, and quite frankly,
neither does me.
Why do you think I let you steal that suit in the first place?
What?
Second chances do not come around all that much.
So, next time you think you might see one.
I suggest you take a real close look at it.
You are my best friend!
Are you sure? You do not want a different toy!
No, I love this one.
Okay. Well, get some sleep. I love you.
Mommy?
Is Daddy a bad man?
I heard some grownups say he is bad.
No.
Daddy just gets confused sometimes. Do you know?
Smart choice. You actually listened, for once.
Under the door.
Okay, where to now?
- Hang tight. - God.
What, what?
Where did he go?
I have no idea. He just vanished.
Set up a five-block perimeter. Now!
Get back! Get back!
Scott, these are my associates.
Is that a camera on an ant?
Yeah, sure. Why not?
Where is the car?
No car. We have got wings.
Incoming!
Put your foot on the central node and mount the thorax.
- How safe is... - Just get on the damn ant, Scott!
Why am I on a police car? Should not I be on a police car?
So, they can give you a lift past their five-block perimeter.
All right.
- Now, what is the next move? - Hang on tight.
This is easy! I am getting the hang of this.
Yank up to go up. It is like a horse.
You are throwing 247 off balance.
Wait! Is it naming 247?
He does not have a name. He has a number, Scott.
Do you have any idea how many ants there are?
Whoa!
Maybe it is... Maybe it is 248.
No, no! Vertigo, vertigo!
- No, I think it is 247. - Wait.
Hang on tight!
I think I am getting the hang of this.
I am controlling 247. He is not listening to you.
What?
- Can I make one little request? - No.
Stop, 247! Time out, time out!
Time out!
All right, hold on!
Just wait! Whoa!
What happens? If I throw up in this helmet.
It is my helmet, Scott. You do not throw up.
Let us set her down, all right!
I am getting light-headed.
Hang on, Scott.
I am getting a little light...
I need a snooze button.
Hit me in 5 minutes.
Hello.
Who are you?
Do you have been standing there? Watching me sleep, this whole time.
Yes.
Why?
Because the last time you were here, you stole something.
Hey, look...
Whoa!
Paraponera clavata.
Giant tropical bullet ants,
ranked highest on the Schmidt, pain index.
They are here to keep an eye on you when I cannot.
Dr. Pym is waiting for you downstairs.
Who?
Hey!
Whose pajamas are these?
How am I supposed to do this?
All right, just one-step at a time.
You do not bite me, I do not step on you. Deal?
I could take down the servers and Cross would not even know it.
We do not need this person.
I assume that you have already met my daughter, Hope.
I did. She is great.
She does not think that we need you.
We do not. We can do these ourselves.
I go to all this effort to let you steal my suit,
then Hope has you arrested.
Okay! We can try, and when he fails. I will do it myself.
She is a little bit anxious.
It has to do with this job,
which, judging by the fact that you are sitting opposite me,
I take it that you are interested.
What job?
Would you like some tea?
Sure.
I was very impressed with...
how you managed to get past my security system.
Freezing that metal was particularly clever.
Were you watching me?
Scott, I have been watching you for a while.
Ever since, you robbed Vista Corp.
Excuse me.
Burgled Vista Corp.
Vista's security system was one of the most advanced in the business.
It was supposed to be unbeatable.
However, you beat it.
Would you like some sugar?
Yeah, thanks.
Do you know what? I am okay.
How do you make them do that?
Ants can lift objects 50 times their weight.
They build, farm, they cooperate with each other.
Right. However, how do you make them do that?
I use electromagnetic waves to stimulate their olfactory nerve center.
I speak to them.
I can go anywhere. Hear anything,
and see everything.
Still know absolutely nothing.
I am late to meet Cross.
Dr. Pym?
You do not need to rise your hand, Scott.
Sorry, I just have one question.
Who are you? Who is she? What is going on?
And can I go back to jail now?
Come with me.
40 years ago, I created a formula that altered atomic relative distance.
I learned how to change the distance between atoms.
That is what powers the suit.
That is why it works.
Wow!
However, it was dangerous.
It was too dangerous.
Therefore, I hid it from the world.
That is when I switched gears, I started my own company.
Pym Tech.
Yes.
I took on a young prot�g� called Darren Cross.
Darren Cross.
He is a big deal.
However, before he was a big deal, he was my assistant.
I thought I saw something in him. The son I never had, perhaps.
He was brilliant, but as we became close.
He began to suspect that I was not telling him everything.
He heard rumors about what was called the Pym Particle?
And he became obsessed with recreating my formula.
However, I would not help him.
Therefore, he conspired against him and me voted me out of my own company.
How could he do that?
The board's chairperson is my daughter, Hope.
She was the deciding vote.
However, she came back to me.
When she saw how close Cross was to cracking my formula.
The process is highly volatile.
If one is not protected by a specialized helmet,
it can affect the brain's chemistry.
I do not think Darren realizes this,
and, you know, he is not the most stable person to begin with.
Therefore, what do you want from me?
Scott, I believe that everyone deserves a shot at redemption.
Do you?
I do.
If you can help me.
I promise I can help you be with your daughter again.
Now, are you ready to redeem yourself?
Absolutely.
My days of breaking into places and stealing shit are done.
What do you want me to do?
I want you to break into a place and steal some shit.
Are you going to be home for dinner tonight?
Yeah. I will pick something up. Text me.
Okay. Good news?
I do not know. It is news.
Are you trying to find my Daddy?
Yeah, I am, sweetheart.
I just want your Daddy to be safe.
Hope, you do not catch him.
This is not the first time these guys...
have tried to get their hands on game-changing weaponry.
That is Mitchell Carson, ex-head of defense at S.H.I.E.L.D.
Presently in the business of toppling governments.
He always wanted my tech.
Now, unless we break in and steal the Yellow jacket.
And destroy all the data.
Darren Cross is going to unleash chaos upon the world.
I think our first move should be calling the Avengers.
I spent half my life...
trying to keep this technology out of the hands of a Stark.
I am sure as hell not going to hand-deliver it to one now.
This is not some cute technology like the Iron Man suit.
This could change the texture of reality.
Besides, they are probably too busy dropping cities out of the sky.
Okay, then why do not you just send the ants?
Scott, they are ants.
Ants, they can do many things, however, they still need a leader.
Somebody that could infiltrate a place that has designed to prevent infiltration.
Hank, I am a thief, all right? I mean, I am a good thief, but this is insane.
He is right, Hank. And you know it.
You have seen the footage, you know what Cross is capable.
I was against using him when we had months,
now we have days.
I am wearing the suit.
Not!
I know the facility inside and out. I know how Cross thinks.
I know this mission better than anybody here.
We need you close to Cross. Otherwise, this mission cannot work.
- We do not have time to screw around! - Hope, please listens to me...
He is a criminal! I am your daughter.
No!
She is right, Hank.
I am not your person.
Why do not you wear the suit?
Do you think I do not want to?
I cannot.
I spent years wearing it,
and it took a toll on me.
You are our only option.
Before Hope lost her mother.
She used to look at me as if I was the greatest man in the world.
Now she looks at me and there is just disappointment.
It is too late for me.
However, not for you.
This is your chance.
The chance to earn that look in your daughter's eyes.
To become the hero that she already thinks you are.
It is not about saving our world.
It is about saving theirs.
Damn. That was a good speech.
Scott,
I need you to be the Ant-Man.
In the right hands,
the relationship between man and suit is symbiotic.
The suit has power. The man harnesses that power.
You need to be skillful, agile, and above all,
you need to be fast.
You should be able to shrink and grow
on a dime.
Therefore, your size always suits your needs.
Now dive through the keyhole, Scott.
You charge big, you dive small, then you emerge big.
Useless.
When you are small, energy is compressed,
therefore, you have the force of a 200-pound man...
behind a fist a 100th of an inch wide. You are like a bullet.
You punch too hard. You kill someone. Too soft, it is a love tap.
In other words, you have to know how to punch.
I was in prison for three years. I know how to punch.
Show me.
#NAME?
Show me...
That is how you punch.
#NAME?
Hope trained in martial arts at a difficult time.
By difficult time, he means when my mother died.
We lost her in a plane crash.
It is bad enough you will not tell me how she died.
Could you please stop telling me that lie?
We are working, here.
All right, princess. Let us get back to work.
Were you going for the hand?
You know, I think this regulator is holding me back.
Do not screw with the regulator.
If that regulator is compromised.
You would go subatomic.
What does that mean?
It means that you would enter a quantum realm.
What does that mean?
It means that you would enter a reality where all concepts of time and space,
become irrelevant...
as you shrink for all eternity.
Everything that you know...
and love...
All gone forever.
Cool. Yeah, if it is not broke...
You have learned about the suit.
However, you have yet to learn about your greatest allies,
the ants.
Loyal, brave,
and your partners on this job.
Paratrechina longicorn. Commonly known as crazy ants.
They are lightning fast and can conduct electricity.
Which makes them useful to fry out enemy electronics.
You are not so crazy.
Hey!
You are cute.
That was a lot scarier a second ago.
It looks like the futures lab has its own isolated power supply.
There is a security guard posted around the clock.
We will need you to take him out to deactivate the security systems.
Okay, who is next?
Paraponera clavata.
I know. Bullet ants, right?
Is number one on the Schmidt pain index?
Hey, guys. Do you remember me from the bedroom?
The Yellow jacket pod is hermetically sealed.
And the only access point is a tube.
We estimate to be about 5 millimeters in diameter.
Why do I have a sick feeling in my stomach?
The tube is protected by a laser grid,
and we can only power that down for 15 seconds.
You are going to need to signal the crazy ants to blow the servers,
retrieve the suit, and exit the vaults before the backup power comes on.
Camponotus pennsylvanicus.
Alternatively known as a carpenter ant.
Ideal for ground and air transport.
Wait a minute! I know this person.
I am going to call him Ant.
That is good. That is very good.
Because this time, you are really going to have to learn how to control him.
Tell them to put the sugar in the teacup.
Are you okay? Did I hurt...?
Hank wants you outside for target practice.
The suit have no weapons, so I made you these discs.
Red shrinks.
Blue enlarges.
Solenoids mandibular.
Known for their bite.
The fire ants have evolved into remarkable architects.
They are handy to get you in and out of difficult places.
You can do it, Scott. Come on.
They are not listening to me.
You have to commit. You have to mean it.
No shortcuts, no lies.
Throwing insults into the mix will not do anyone any good, Hope.
We do not have time for coddling.
Our focus should be on helping Scott!
Really?
Is that where our focus should be?
Hope!
I do not know why I came to you in the first place.
We cannot do this without her.
God.
You have to lock your doors.
I mean, really, there are some weird folks in this neighborhood.
Do you think this is a joke?
Do you have any idea what? He is asking you to risk.
You have a daughter.
I am doing this for her.
You know, when my mother died, I did not see him for two weeks.
He was in grief.
Yeah, so I was, and I was seven.
And he never came back. Not in any way that counted.
He just sent me off to boarding school.
You know, I thought...
with all that is at stake,
just maybe we might have a chance of making peace.
However, even now, he still wants to shut me out.
He does not want to shut you out. He trusts you.
Then why are you here?
It proves that he loves you.
Hope, look at me.
I am expendable.
That is why I am here.
You must have realized that by now.
I mean, it is why I am in the suit and you are not.
He would rather lose this fight than lose you.
Anyway...
You know, I did not know you had a daughter.
When I called the cops on you.
What is her name?
Cassie.
It is a pretty name.
You have to clear your mind, Scott. You have to make your thoughts precise.
That is how it works.
Think about Cassie.
About how badly you want to see her. And use that to focus.
Open your eyes,
and just think about what you want the ants to do.
That is good!
Your mother convinced me...
to let her join me on my missions.
They called her the Wasp.
She was born to it.
And there is not a day that goes by...
that I do not regret having said yes.
It was 1987.
Separatists had hijacked a Soviet missile silo in Kursk,
and launched an ICBM at the United States.
The only way to the internal mechanics...
was through solid titanium.
I knew I had to shrink between the molecules to disarm the missile.
But my regulator had sustained too much damage.
Your mother.
She did not hesitate.
Janet! No!
She turned off her regulator,
and she went subatomic...
to deactivate the bomb.
And she was gone.
Your mom died a hero.
And I spent the next 10 years...
trying to learn all I could about the quantum realm.
You were trying to bring her back.
However, all I learned was we know nothing.
It is not your fault.
She made her choice.
However, why did not you tell me that sooner?
I was trying to protect you.
I lost your mother.
I did not mean to lose you, too.
I am sorry.
This is awesome.
It is awesome! Do you know?
You people are breaking down walls, you are healing.
It is important.
I ruined the moment, did not I?
Yes, you did. Yes.
I am going to make some tea.
Nailed it!
That is a good boy, Ant.
The final phase of your training will be a stealth incursion.
It is freezing!
You could not make a suit with a flannel lining.
column4: Emily tell Carlos to tell you to get to me what kind of safe it was? And he says

column3: You must retrieve this prototype of a signal decoy.
I invented a device during my S.H.I.E.L.D. days.
We need it to counteract the transmission blockers...
that Cross installed in the futures vault.
It is currently collecting dust...
in one of Howard Stark's old storage facilities in upstate New York.
Should be a piece of cake.
You are over the target area.
Disengage now, Scott!
Squadron A! Go!
B, go!
C, go!
All right! Ant, please do not drop me this time.
It feels like a big leap from sugar cubes to this!
Stay calm.
People? We might have a problem.
Hank, did not you say this was some old warehouse?
It is not!
You son of a bitch!
- Scott gets out of there. - Abort!
Abort now!
No, it is okay. It does not look like anyone's home.
Ant gets me to the roof!
He is going to lose the suit.
He is going to lose his life.
All right! I am on the roof of the target building.
Somebody is home, Scott.
What is going on down there, Sam?
It is the Falcon!
I had a sensor trip however, I am not seeing anything.
Wait a second.
Abort, Scott! Abort now!
It is okay. He cannot see me.
I can see you.
He can see me.
Hi. I am Scott.
Did he just say hi? I am Scott!
#NAME?
I appreciate it. So, who are you?
I am Ant-Man.
Ant-Man?
What? Do not you have heard of me?
No, you would not have heard of me.
Do you want to tell me what you want?
I was hoping I could grab a piece of technology.
Just for a few days. I am going to return it.
I need it to save the world. You know how that is.
I know exactly how that is.
Located the breach.
- Bringing him in. - Sorry about this!
What are you doing?
Breach is an adult male, who has some sort of shrinking tech?
Sorry!
Look! I am sorry about this. Sorry.
That is enough!
Ant! A little help!
I have lost visual.
He is inside my pack!
Sorry!
You seem like a great person.
It is important to me that Cap never finds out about this.
That was completely irresponsible and dangerous!
You jeopardized everything!
You got it.
Well done!
Wait a minute.
Did you just compliment me?
#NAME?
I was good, was not I?
Hey, how about the fact that I fought an Avenger and did not die?
Let us not dwell on the past.
We have to finish our planning.
You do not mind him.
You did well.
Darren.
How did you get in here?
You left the front door open, Hank.
It is official.
You are old.
The plans.
He will kill him.
Well, what do I owe this pleasure?
I have good news.
Really?
What is that?
Pym Tech, the company you created,
is about to become one of the most profitable operations in the world.
We are anticipating $15 billion in sales, tomorrow alone.
You are welcome.
I know this is odd, however, I would like you to be there.
This is my moment. I want you to see it.
Sure, Darren! Yeah, sure!
I will be there.
What did you see in me?
I do not know what you mean.
All those years ago, you picked me.
What did you see?
I saw myself.
Then why did you push me away?
Because I saw too much of myself.
He knows. He is baiting you.
We have to call it off.
We are all taking risks.
What if he saw me here!
He did not. There is no way.
How do you know that?
Darren, hi.
Hope, where are you right now?
I am at home. Why?
I just saw Hank.
I still get nothing but contempt from him.
Do not let him rile up you. He is just a senile old man.
We need to start everyone working around the clock.
Get the assembly line up and running.
And I am tripling security.
Full sensors at all entrances,
and exterior air vents fitted with steel micromesh.
Great! Good idea!
Thank you, Hope. I am so lucky to have you on my team.
He is tripling security. He has lost his mind, and he is onto you.
However, he is not onto you.
He is adding full body scanners to all entrances,
and closing exterior vents.
How are we going to get Scott inside?
The water main.
You cannot add security to a water main.
The pressure is too strong, but if we can decrease it,
that is how I get in.
Somebody would have to reach the building's control center,
to change the water pressure.
Hank and I will be beside Cross. How are we supposed to do that?
Therefore, we expand our team.
What do we need?
A fake security guard on the inside to de-pressurize the water system,
somebody else to hack in to the power supply,
and kill the laser grid,
a person getaway.
No, no. No, no, no. Not those three Wombats. No way.
Thank you for the coffee, ma'am.
It is not too often that you rob a place then are welcomed back.
Because we just robbed you.
You know that he was arrested for stealing a smoothie machine, right!
Two smoothie machines.
Are you sure, they can handle this?
We can handle it. We are professionals.
You will forgive us if we are not instilled with confidence.
Well, hey, everybody just kick back and relax a little bit, man.
We know our business.
We broke into this spooky-ass house, did not we?
I let you.
Well, one could say that I let you let me.
#NAME?
#NAME?
#NAME?
The system?
Yeah, we are doomed.
All right!
There is something you people need to see.
When you get to this corner,
there is going to be three offices on your left side.
Damn!
Whoa! That is so cool, bro!
Now, look, this is going to get weird. All right!
It is freaky, but it is safe. There is no reason to be scared.
No, no. Daddy does not get scared.
#NAME?
Good.
This is the work of gypsies.
That is witchcraft.
That is amazing.
That is like some David Copperfield shit.
That is some kind of wizardry.
This is sorcery!
How would you do that, bro?
You do not freak out. Look at your shoulder.
Get off! Get off!
Wait, I thought Daddy did not get scared!
I gave them each half a Xanax,
and Hank explained the science of the suit to them.
They fell right asleep.
Hey, look, I want to thank you for...
No, please do not.
We are all doing this for reasons much bigger than any one of us.
I am just glad that you might have a slight chance of maybe pulling this off.
Hey, thank you, you know, for that pep talk.
You know, the truth is, I actually went from despising you...
to almost liking you.
You really should write poetry.
Get some sleep, Scott.
All right, just so we are clear, everyone here knows his role, right!
#NAME?
#NAME?
#NAME?
Do you know what? I get to wear a uniform.
#NAME?
I am sorry. I am good. I am good. I am just excited.
Your girlfriend is hot.
So, you know, that makes me nervous, too.
You are very beautiful, ma'am.
#NAME?
Do you know what? I was thinking of a tactic, like when I go undercover.
Like a whistling. You know what I am saying. To like, blend in.
No. Do not whistle. No whistling.
It is not The Andy Griffith Show. No whistling.
All clear in Sector 1.
Step out.
All clear.
We are set.
Wish me luck.
Utilities online.
Hey! What are you doing?
Boss-man said to secure the area, therefore, I am securing it.
I am the boss.
Utilities 1.3...
Water level is dropping!
Coming up on extraction pipe.
All right! I see it.
Come on, I have to get up there. That is it. That is it, people! Yes!
Yes! You got it! You got it! Come on!
All right! Let us fly, Ant.
The Ant-Man is in the building.
Pym is pulling up. Right on time.
Got a Crown Vic right outside there.
Is this a problem?
Considering the Crown Vic's the most commonly used car...
for undercover cops, man!
Yes, this is problem.
That is Pym.
No.
I am deploying the bullet ants.
Papanera Claire de Merna Merna
I do not remember what it is called, but I feel bad for this guy.
#NAME?
Do you see? That is what I am talking.
That is what I call an unfortunate casualty...
in a very serious operation.
Signal decoy in place.
I mean, pretty woman did well, Scott.
Looks like Pym�s is being arrested.
Scott, we have problem.
Problem? Is what the problem?
Dave! Dave! That is not part of plan!
Listen to me.
If I do not get into this building, people will die.
That is very dramatic.
Are you kidding me?
Problem solved.
Well!
How do I look?
column4: Emily tell Carlos to tell you to get to me what kind of safe it was? And he says

column3: There he is.
Just in time. Come on.
column4: Emily tell Carlos to tell you to get to me what kind of safe it was? And he says

column3: 12-point verification.
Little over-the-top, do not you think, Darren?
Confirming authorization level.
Well! You can never be too safe.
Access granted.
Got to hand it to you, Darren.
You really did it.
And you only know the half of it, Hank.
Arriving in second position.
All right, top speed, Ant. Let us go!
Proceeding to command position.
I will be right back, Ant.
All right, people. I am in position.
I am going to signal the ants.
No, no, no, no, no!
Did you see that?
Assume formation.
All right, you cute little crazies,
let us fry these servers!
Let us go get them, buddy!
Servers are fried.
Data backup completely erased.
Heading to the particle chamber.
Hello, Dr. Cross.
My associates have agreed to your terms.
Wonderful!
Mr. Carson introduced me to these fine men here.
They are representatives of Hydra.
They are not what they were.
They are doing some interesting work.
And I am enjoying myself.
You tried to hide your technology from me.
Now it is going to blow up in your face.
I mean, I saw that punch coming a mile away,
however, I just figured it would be all pathetic and weak.
Well, you figured wrong.
I know this van.
Is anybody home?
All right, people. I am here.
I am setting the charges.
EXPLOSIVE
Great job, guys. I will take it from here.
Good boy, Ant!
Final position.
People, how are we looking on that laser grid?
#NAME?
- I am getting close! - No, you are not.
San Francisco P.D!
Out of the van!
I know you are in there!
#NAME?
Ready to jump. Do you read, Kurt?
So close.
- Freeze! - Okay, hold up! Wait a minute!
There was a black person that looked exactly like me.
Who attacked us and put us in the back of this disgusting van.
- Get out of the van! - Okay, I am coming.
Take it easy!
No, I will not move! Go now!
- Wait! - What? What do you mean wait?
Phew!
Wait! What?
Hey, little guy.
I always suspected you had a suit stored away somewhere.
Which begs the question?
Who is the new Ant-Man?
Who is the man that my beloved mentor?
Trusted even more than me.
Scott Lang.
A martyr.
Who took on the system? And paid the price,
losing his family and his only daughter in the process.
Exactly your kind of person, Hank!
He escapes his jail cell without leaving any clue as to how.
Then he disappears magically,
despite having no money in his name.
Now he brings me the Ant-Man suit.
The only thing that can rival my creation.
Darren, do not do this.
If you sell to these men,
it is going to be chaos.
I already have.
And for twice the price...
thanks to you.
It is not easy to infiltrate successfully an Avengers facility.
Thankfully, word travels fast.
I will sell them the Yellow jacket, I am keeping the particle to myself.
They do not run on diesel.
If you want the fuel, you will have to come to me.
What do you call the only man?
Who can arm the most powerful weapon in the world?
The most powerful man in the world.
You proud of me, yet!
You can stop this, Darren. It is not too late.
It has been too late for a long time now.
Darren!
What are you doing?
He was not anymore capable of caring for you than he was for me.
This is not who you are.
It is the particles altering your brain chemistry.
Wait! Wait! Wait! Wait, and wait.
You are right. I have to be the one to do it.
Here we go.
Drop your gun.
You know, I came to the house the other night to kill him.
However, you were in there.
You are sick and I can help you. Just put the gun down.
I was not ready to kill you then.
However, I think I am now!
Drop your gun now!
You picked the wrong side, Hope.
Daddy!
Hank, no.
No, Hank.
Hank? Listen, you are going to be okay.
All right! You are going to be just fine.
Take the suit off, or I will blow your brains out and peel it off.
We got a 10-33 at Pym Tech.
Request immediate backup!
Go, go, and go!
Get me to the roof.
And radio ahead.
I want to make sure the helicopter is ready to take off.
You two,
kill anything that comes out of that vault!
Daddy, can you move?
We need to get him out of here.
Go get that suit.
Hey, Scott!
Hey, did I save your life?
Scott?
Scott?
Thank you, Luis.
#NAME?
#NAME?
Feels somewhat weird, you know.
Yeah, but we are not done yet.
You get out of here before this place blows!
Damn it! That person.
Hey! We are getting out of here!
The charges are set.
We have to find a way out of here, and fast.
You do not worry.
I am not going to die.
And neither are you.
It is not a keychain.
It is total chaos in here! Multiple shots fired!
And there is a tank.
A little help!
I got it.
We need a doctor!
We have him.
Thank you.
Let us go!
Ant!
Go!
You are going to regret that.
Wait a minute! Get out of that van!
- What? - Get out of that van!
It is too loud. There is a tank. I cannot hear you!
Hey! Hey! Hey!
Are you crazy? Put the gun down!
The windows!
Did you think you could stop? The future with a heist.
It was never just a heist!
Put the gun down!
Okay! I got him! I got him. There he is! Go, go, and go!
We have to set it down in somewhere.
I am going to disintegrate you!
Playing Disintegration by the Cure.
Call 911!
It is okay.
Freeze! Put your hands up! Get them up!
Scott?
Paxton, you have to listen to me!
Paxton, turn around! Take me back!
I am taking you back to prison.
There is something in that backyard that needs to be destroyed.
In the bug zapper. There...
You need to desist right now! Your delusions are out of hand.
All units, we have a 2-36 in progress at 840 Winter Street.
- Cassie! - That is my house.
You do not be scared.
Paxton let me help!
- You do not move. - Let me help!
- Maggie! What is going on? - He has Cassie!
#NAME?
- Thing? - I do not know! I do not know!
Are you a monster?
Do I look like a monster?
I want my Daddy!
I want your Daddy, too.
There you are.
Daddy, is that you?
Hi, peanut.
Why do not you pick on someone your own size?
Now, where did you go, little person?
There you are.
Not just me!
Damn it!
Go! Go!
Scott need us. Do you know what I am saying?
And nothing is going to stop us!
Back it up.
#NAME?
#NAME?
#NAME?
#NAME?
#NAME?
- Back it up! - Yeah, just back it up.
No, no. Just back it up.
You insult me, Scott.
Your very existence is insulting to me.
You know, it would be much easier to hit you if you were bigger.
Yeah, I agree.
Cassie!
I am going to show you just how insignificant you are.
Cassie! I am coming!
That is a messed-up looking dog.
I am going to destroy...
everything you love.
Freeze! S.F.P.D.
I cannot break through.
Its titanium, you idiot!
#NAME?
Sorry, sweetheart!
You have to help Daddy pay for his mistakes.
#NAME?
Stay behind me.
I am going to have to shrink between the molecules to get in there.
Get away from us!
Daddy, help!
I love you, Cassie.
Daddy, where are you?
You could go subatomic.
You could go subatomic.
No!
You would enter a reality.
Where all concepts of time and space.
All concepts of time and space become irrelevant.
All concepts of time and space become irrelevant.
Come back, Daddy!
As you shrink for all eternity.
Everything that you know,
and love.
All gone forever.
Daddy, where are you?
Where are you, Daddy?
Come on, Daddy!
Where are you?
Where are you?
Where are you?
- Daddy! - Cassie.
Wait!
Come back, Daddy! Daddy!
You do not screw with the regulator!
Daddy!
I love you so much.
I love you, too.
So much.
There is a big hole in the roof.
Sorry.
#NAME?
Mommy!
She is fine! She is fine!
Scott, please.
Do not you remember anything?
Hank. I do not.
There must be something else.
Well! I suppose the human mind just...
cannot comprehend the experience.
However, you made it.
You went in,
and you got out.
It is amazing!
Scott...
I will walk you out.
Get some rest.
Is it possible?
When did this happen?
Nothing is happening.
Hold on. Something is kind of happening.
Well! If that is the case...
shoot me again.
Yeah. I do not know what you were doing grabbing and kissing me like that.
I am a little surprised myself.
I have to get somewhere. I will see you later, Hank.
Really, Hope.
#NAME?
- You are full of shit. - Yeah.
Scott, I met with my captain today.
He wanted a report on the night that you got out of jail.
Something happened with the cameras.
Some circuits are fried.
However, I told him that I processed it correctly.
Really?
Yeah!
I cannot send Cassie's Daddy back to jail on a technical glitch, right?
Thank you, Paxton.
I blow it away.
Thank you for everything you do for Cassie.
You do not worry! That is my pleasure.
However, no. This one, I did for you.
#NAME?
Yeah.
We even talk about after all of that?
#NAME?
#NAME?
Yeah. She has been practicing all week.
Today was the magic day.
I recorded it on my phone. Here.
No, that cannot be Cassie. That is not you.
- Yeah, it is. - Yeah, it is.
This is a professional gymnast. There is no way that are you.
Yeah, that is she.
Good boy!
Sweetie, that is amazing, peanut.
Sorry.
It is work.
Yeah.
All right!
Here is the deal. Just give me the facts.
Just the facts. Only the facts.
Breathe. Focus. Keep it simple.
No, no, no. No doubt, no doubt. Okay.
I am at this art museum with my cousin Ignacio, right?
And there was this abstract expressionism exhibit.
But you know me, I am more like a Neo-Cubist kind of guy, right?
But there was this one Rothko that was sublime, bro! My God!
#NAME?
I just get excited and stuff.
Anyway, Ignacio tells me.
I met this crazy-fine writer chick at the spot last night. Like fine-fine.
Crazy-stupid fine. He goes up to the bartender and goes.
Look at the girl with me. Do you know what I am saying?
She is crazy-stupid fine, right?
The bartender's all like. Yeah, crazy-stupid fine.
So this writer chick tells Ignacio.
I am like a boss in the world of guerrilla journalism.
And I got mad connects with the peeps behind the curtains.
Do you know what I am saying? Ignacio, is like for real?
And she is like yeah, you know what, I cannot tell you who my contact is,
because he works with the Avengers.
No.
Yeah, and this dude sounds like a badass, man.
He comes up to her and says.
I am looking for this dude, who is new on the scene.
Who is flashing his fresh tack?
Who got the bomb moves, right? Did you get?
She is like. Well! We got everything nowadays. We got a guy who jumps.
We got a person, who swings, we got a guy who crawls up the walls.
You got to be more specific.
He is like, I am looking for a guy that shrinks.
I am, like. Damn! I got all nervous. Because I would keep mad secrets for you, bro.
Therefore, I asked Ignacio...
Did the badass tell the stupid-fine writer chick?
To tell you to tell me, because I am tight with Ant-Man.
That he is looking for him.
And? What did he say?
He said yes.
ANT-MAN Translation. Review. Synchronization by Angel.
Wait. There are more scene after the credits.
I want to show you something.
I realized you could not destroy the power.
All you can do is making sure, that is in the right hands.
This is an advanced prototype.
That your mother, and I worked on together.
She never has to use it.
Now I realize that we were... We were working on it for you.
Maybe it is time we finished it.
It is about damn time.
Hey, Cap!
This is putting him a lot easier a week ago.
#NAME?
Even if he did...
Who knows if the Accords will let him help?
We are on our own.
Maybe not.
I know a person.
ANT-MAN WILL RETURN
